topic.title: Search and Refactor Actions for ID/IDREFS

body.p: offers full support for managing ID/IDREFS through the search and refactor actions available in the contextual menu. In Text mode, these actions are available in the Quick Assist menu as well.
body.note: A quick way to navigate to the declaration of an ID in Text mode is to move the cursor over an ID reference and use the navigation.
body.p: Selecting an ID for which you execute search or refactor operations differs from the Text mode to the Author mode. In the Text mode you position the caret inside the declaration or reference of an ID. In the Author mode collects all the IDs by analyzing each element from the path to the root. In case more IDs are available, you are prompted to choose one of them.
